long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Where is My Cat? is an entertaining game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, players are tasked with finding their missing cat within a given time limit. The game is set in various locations, and players must carefully search and interact with objects to uncover clues and locate their furry friend. With its charming graphics and engaging gameplay, "Where is My Cat?" offers a delightful and immersive experience for cat lovers and puzzle enthusiasts alike. You can enjoy playing this game for free on the website https://monkeymart.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
